local_intent: Iteratively lower the grasped white_plate until contact with the red_plate is detected, then release and retreat.
assumptions: White plate is already grasped and held in the gripper
Red plate is within reach and roughly localized (parent tree provided prior alignment)
coherence_with_global: Replaces the LowerUntilContact leaf: performs a controlled iterative lowering (small z deltas) with contact checks, then opens gripper and retreats, matching the global plan's lowering, gentle contact, release, and retreat steps.
